calendar.content_prompt: On the day USSF-44 launches, post about human ambition + Gaza Rose. Pair hope in space with hope on Earth.
calendar.suggested_post:
Today USSF-44 launches into orbit.

Someone will watch from Gaza.

The Gaza Rose exists because beauty and hope persist everywhere.

#GazaRose #Space #Hope
